title: Fat Guapo Talks Being Shot, His Best Friend Dying, Managing Lil Weirdo And More
description:
Fat Guapo talks about becoming an artists' manager, going on tour, family dynamic, friendship with Doknow and more!

-----
00:00 Intro
1:41 - Mom not being around growing up. Having a good relationship with her now
3:32 - Dealing with mom being absent
5:31 - Getting sh*t at 18 years old in his own hood was his first reality check
7:55 - Life Changing experience in 2018 when he lost his friend
10:54 - Going back to the streets after being on tour. Not understanding that the party doesn't last forever
18:25 - Tapping in with Lil Weirdo and Lil Maru because Weirdo’s mom is Guapo’s OG
20:18 - Managing Weirdo and Maru even though they are from a different city
21:48 - Lil Weirdo wants to stay independent, turned down a $3M deal
25:26 - DoKnow says he’ll body Lil Weirdo in basketball
33:44 - Getting ready to go on tour with all his artists. Not going to pay DoKnow to come on tour
35:42 - Fielding new opportunities while managing a bunch of different artists
36:23 - Lil Maru getting ready to drop a new tape. Giving Cypress his flowers for putting a lot of people on the west coast and putting important plays together
37:39 - Feeling like being a manager is his calling

-----
